pullRequest.title: Almost ready
pullRequest.bodyText:
I skipped this patch. Didn't know how to resolve the conflicts.
0385-only-add-passanger-entities-once-from-spawners.patch
It still doesn't compile because of MojangAPI 1.16.2 missing dependency.
Enjoy ;)

nodes.diffHunk:

 Adds villagers as separate config

--    protected boolean inPortal; public final boolean inPortal() { return this.inPortal; } // Paper - OBFHELPER
